name: normalize-selector
readme:
# Normalize-Selector

Normalize CSS selectors.

Examples:

* `#foo>.bar` -> `#foo > .bar`
* ` 	#foo 	 > 	 .bar 	 ` -> `#foo > .bar`
* `foo[ a = 'b' ]` -> `foo[a='b']`

## Tests

Run mocha tests on node.js with:

```
npm test
```

or:

```
node ./test/mocha/node-suite.js
```

## rawgithub

View the browser suite directly on
